name: MCP Prompt Templates Server
description: A powerful MCP server for managing customizable prompt templates and static resources
longDescription: This Model Context Protocol (MCP) server provides a comprehensive solution for managing and serving prompt templates. It supports dynamic template loading from YAML configurations, argument substitution with Mustache-style placeholders, and resource management for static Markdown content. Perfect for creating reusable prompts for various AI tasks including meeting analysis, content summarization, and custom workflows.
